tool_description: Access endless trivia question and answers. See more info at https://api-ninjas.com/api/trivia.
name: Trivia by API-Ninjas
title: Trivia by API-Ninjas

api_list.name: /v1/trivia

optional_parameters.name: limit
optional_parameters.description: How many results to return. Must be between **1** and **30**. Default is **1**.

optional_parameters.name: category
optional_parameters.description:
Category of trivia. Possible values are: 

**artliterature
language
sciencenature
general
fooddrink
peopleplaces
geography
historyholidays
entertainment
toysgames
music
mathematics
religionmythology
sportsleisure**

test_endpoint.question: What is the capital of Panama ?
